title: Aware: An Inquiry Into Consciousness... Our Psychedelic Quest for Life, Liberty and Intellectual Property. "a psychonaut adventure"
description: A miracle product dropped in the lap of consumer Hell has a tendency to cause trouble, or worse ... conversation. What does an astronaut, a blue-collar worker, and a reporter have in common with a scientist bent on world domination? ... Everything. What if you woke up this morning to find you were more than one person? "AWARE" is what you could call a psychedelic book, a living machine with an entrepreneurial spirit and a sense of humor begging us to load up our animal baggage and step inside. "AWARE" An Inquiry Into Consciousness... Our Psychedelic Quest for Life, Liberty and Intellectual Property. Enjoy the ride, B.E.B.
author: Brandon Earl Bristow
